title: Ep221 If At First You Don't Succeed...
description:
This week, the gals try and try again to discuss some persistent perpetrators. Topics include some suspicious toothpaste, some hard-earned DNA evidence, and the habits of serial killers. Crack open some Loveblock Sauvignon Blanc, clear your cookies, and tune in for If At First You Don't Succeed...

For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
